attributes.name: Cobalt Strike Beacon via Social Media and GitHub Detection

cases.name: LNK Spear-Phishing Command
cases.query: source:endpoint @process.name:cmd.exe @process.command_line:("xcopy /h /y" AND " ren " AND BugSplatRc64.dll AND nau.exe AND Требования) | aggregate count by @host, @user, @parent_process.name, @process.name, @process.command_line, @process.id, @process.guid

cases.name: C2 via Social Media Platforms
cases.query: source:endpoint_web @process.name:nau.exe @http.url:(*github.com/* OR *raw.githubusercontent.com/* OR *quora.com/profile/* OR *techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/* OR *techcommunity.microsoft.com/users/* OR *learn.microsoft.com/en-us/collections/* OR *my.mail.ru/mail/*/photo/*) | aggregate count by @host, @user, @process.name, @http.url, @http.method, @process.guid

cases.name: Cobalt Strike Beacon Injection via Reflective Loading
Malicious DLL Hash
cases.query: source:endpoint @file.hash:(2FF63CACF26ADC536CD177017EA7A369 OR 08FB7BD0BB1785B67166590AD7F99FD2 OR 02876AF791D3593F2729B1FE4F058200 OR F9E20EB3113901D780D2A973FF539ACE OR B2E24E061D0B5BE96BA76233938322E7 OR 15E590E8E6E9E92A18462EF5DFB94298 OR 66B6E4D3B6D1C30741F2167F908AB60D OR ADD6B9A83453DB9E8D4E82F5EE46D16C OR A02C80AD2BF4BFFBED9A77E9B02410FF OR 672222D636F5DC51F5D52A6BD800F660 OR 2662D1AE8CF86B0D64E73280DF8C19B3 OR 4948E80172A4245256F8627527D7FA96) | aggregate count by @host, @user, @file.name, @file.path, @file.hash

attributes.message: Cobalt Strike Beacon Activity Detected: {distinct_count} distinct TTPs on host {@host}, source IP {@ip.src}, or user {@user}. Techniques: {case_names}. Details: {@process.command_line OR @image_load.name OR @http.url OR @file.hash}. Timeframe: {first_activity} to {last_activity}
